resources.string:
When you start Pitch Counter, one pitcher (named Pitcher 1 by default) has already been added for you.

Click on this line and you will go to that pitcher's information screen. Click the + button to increment the pitch counter. (You can click - if you get ahead of yourself.)

The information screen will show the pitcher's name, the pitch count for this pitcher, and the time of the last pitch.

Click the Edit button in the Action Bar at the top of the screen to change the pitcher's name. There is also a Delete button there.

If you back to the main screen, you can add another pitcher by clicking the Add button in the Action Bar.
